default.$description: Default background for interactive elements like buttons and inputs in their resting state

lufa.useCase: Button backgrounds, input backgrounds, interactive card backgrounds

hover.$description: Background color when hovering over interactive elements - provides visual feedback

lufa.useCase: Hover state for buttons, inputs, cards, list items

active.$description: Background color when pressing/clicking interactive elements - provides immediate feedback

lufa.useCase: Active/pressed state for buttons and clickable elements

disabled.$description: Background color for disabled interactive elements - indicates non-interactive state

lufa.useCase: Disabled buttons, disabled inputs, non-interactive elements
